Text:
Absolutely awesome work!

Though I would suggest you include mirtitles.org in description of the torrents so that more and more people join your effort!

'Problems in General Physics' had been an only book by Irodov or Mir pub that I'd ever used! and that is when I was in the highschool.Thank you for all these marvelous uploads.I have a busy year ahead! 
RIP Irodov.
